trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: O `DrawItem` o evento é gerado por controlos de desenho de proprietário, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: Contém todas as informações que é necessário para o utilizador para o item especificado, incluindo o índice de itens de pintura o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>no qual deve ser feito o desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe para o controlo especificado com o tipo de letra especificado, estado, superfície para desenhar no e os limites para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para utilizar, normalmente, o controlo principal <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> limites para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> índice do valor do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: O controlo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe para o controlo especificado com o tipo de letra especificado, estado, cor de primeiro plano, cor de fundo, superfície para desenhar no e os limites para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para utilizar, normalmente, o controlo principal <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> limites para desenhar no.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> índice do valor do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: O controlo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informações.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para desenhar o controlo com.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para desenhar o controlo com.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de fundo do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the BackColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, a BackColor é definida para <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item não for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, a propriedade BackColor é definida para <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rectângulo que representa os limites do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo dentro dos limites especificados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor e com a cor adequada.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Se o item que está a ser desenhado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, o fundo é desenhado com o texto realçado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo de foco dentro dos limites especificados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se o item que está a ser desenhado tem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, o retângulo de foco é desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de letra está atribuído ao item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Um sugeridos <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, normalmente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>propriedade do controlo principal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> atribuída ao item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de primeiro plano do item a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the ForeColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, a ForeColor é definida para <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the ForeColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item não for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, a propriedade ForeColor é definida para <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do item a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a superfície de gráficos para desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície para desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de índice do item que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>valor do item a ser desenhado em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode devolver -1 se itemswere removidos da lista.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O valor numérico que representa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>valor do item a ser desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do item a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: Este valor de propriedade pode ser uma combinação da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>Membros de enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: Os membros podem ser combinados utilizando operadores bit a bit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> que representa o estado do item a ser desenhado.
